sentence: But there's no grand plan right now.? Skalka, to her credit, also acknowledges that Kinzinger appears to be obsessed with the former president, especially when it comes to his vote in favor of Trump's second impeachment and the fact that Kinzinger is one of only two Republicans to serve on the January 6 Select Commitee, along with fellow RINO Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY).
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Is He a Masochist? Kinzinger Says It Would Be 'Fun' to Run Against Trump in 2024, Even If He Gets 'Crushed'

sentence: But there's no grand plan right now.?
